title: cant download league of legends.
body:
when I go to download the client it diverts me to this site and says, Sorry cannot reach webpage. 
I was having trouble starting my client and I decided to uninstall to reinstall again as that generally works. 
Can anyone give me a  hand or know whats going on? 
Cheers, 
Tiltlawd{{summoner:11}}

replies.body: Can you try downloading the installer from [**this page**](https://signup.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload)? I hope that works for you, but please let me know if it didn't!
Hey bro this helped me out BIG TIME you ever in the BC area your welcome by the crib n you can bring your laptop LAN PARTY!!!!!! 7788686661

Dear Targon,
Im also having this issue and uninstalled to try reinstall, but when installer the link didnt work, as Tiltlawd mentioned.
The link you suggested also produced the same result, is there any other alternative?

Thanks
OCE, Touchgently

Hmm.. since our standard installer pages aren't working for you, I recommend opening up a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our tech specialists can hook you up with another installer for League. We can't upload files directly to the boards, otherwise, I'd just drop it here.

If you have any questions, let me know.
I found changing the server from EU West to NA within the Legacy client forced it to update.
